latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

fields.value: Tracking Improved Varieties in South Asia (TRIVSA)

dsDescriptionValue.value: To devise practical means for the regular monitoring of variety diffusion and for the generation of widely accessible databases on rice varietal improvement in South Asia.

keywordValue.value: Released varieties, Expert opinion method, Full-time Equivalent, Varietal adoption, Varietal replacement

fields.value: Subject: Released varieties compiled  Type: 1.   Notes: 1510; Subject: Experts participated in the expert elicitations  Type: 2.  Notes: 599; Subject: Researchers interview in the research's survey  Type: 3.  Notes: 313; Subject: Focus group discussions conducted at village level  Type: 4.  Notes: 675; Subject: households  Type: 5.  Notes: 7286;

otherGeographicCoverage.value: India, Bangladesh, Nepal, Sri Lanka, Bhutan

value: Chhattisgarh, Odisha, West Bengal in India, selected provinces/districts for whole country (Bangladesh, Nepal, Sri Lanka, Bhutan)
